Reference

All functions

LandR-package

LandR package

addNewCohorts()

Add new cohorts

addPixelGroup()

Add the correct pixelGroups to a pixelCohortData object

assignLightProb()

Assign light probability

defineFlammable()

Define flammability map

.cleanLandWebStudyArea()

Clean up the LandWeb study area from David Andison

equivalentName()

Return equivalent name from a data.frame of equivalencies

loadkNNSpeciesLayers()

Load kNN species layers from online data repository

makePixelGroups()

Create the correct string for pixelGroups

makeVegTypeMap()

Make a vegetation type map from a stack of species abundances

overlayStacks()

Overlay layers within raster stacks

plotVTM()

Summary plots of leading vegetation types

polygonClean()

Do an arbitrary set of operations on a polygon

prepInputsEcoregion()

Prepare ecoregion table

prepInputsLCC()

Simple prepInputs for LCC2005 or LCC2010

prepInputsSpecies() prepInputsMainInput()

Download and prepare a species traits table for use with LandR_BiomassGMOrig module

prepInputsSpeciesEcoregion()

Prepare species ecoregion table

randomStudyArea()

Create default study areas for use with LandR modules

rmMissingCohorts()

Remove missing cohorts from cohortData based on pixelGroupMap

speciesEcoregionLatestYear()

Pull out the values from speciesEcoregion table for current time

getSpeciesTable() prepSpeciesTable()

Download and prepare a species traits table for use with LBMR module

sppColors()

Create species color vector from a sppEquiv table

sppEquivalencies_CA

Table of species name equivalencies for Canadian trees

sumRastersBySpecies()

Function to sum rasters of species layers

vegTypeMapGenerator()

Generate vegetation type map
